concat.scalar: Hi, my name is TJ Bot!
I'm TJ Bot, it's nice to meet you!
I can do a whole lot of things.
I can wave to you or shine my light different colors!
I'm a funny robot, ask me to tell you a joke!
Try asking me to shine my light red, blue, or yellow!
Did you know I can move my arm? Try asking me to raise my arm, lower it, or wave to you!

variables.title: I can do a whole lot of things.

concat.scalar: A robot walks into a bar. “What can I get you?” the bartender asks. “I need something to loosen up,” the robot replies. So the bartender serves him a screwdriver.
Why was the robot upset? People kept pushing its buttons.
What is a robot's favorite kind of music? Heavy metal!
What color would you like me to shine?

variables.title: What color would you like me to shine?
